TopicTitle: Planet Earth video from geostationary satelite.

Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KlMKb47rfEk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

It could help the developers of Kerbal as far as graphics go.
This is the best thing I have ever seen.

That looks like Kerbin Stationary Orbit, the thing is, in KSP, we have stars and nebulae that spin around in the background, giving the impression that we are moving. This video doesn\'t. By the way, why is the Earth so dark and rough looking?

> 
> By the way, why is the Earth so dark and rough looking?

Probably the wavelengths used; it\'s from a weather satellite, so it\'s going to be set up to get good images of cloud masses rather than the land.
